意識過剰: (いしきかじょう) - (yoji) hyperconsciousness; too great a sense (of); something being only one's imagination; letting imagination run away with one
意識障害: (いしきしょうがい) - disturbance of consciousness
意趣遺恨: (いしゅいこん) - (yoji) grudge; spite; malice; rancor
意馬心猿: (いばしんえん) - (yoji)  it is hard to keep one's worldly desires and passions in check
愕く: (おどろく) - to be surprised; to be astonished
愕然: (がくぜん) - astonishment; shock; amazement; terror
愚にもつかない: (ぐにもつかない) - nonsensical; ridiculous; trifling
愚の骨頂: (ぐのこっちょう) - the height of folly; sheer stupidity
愚僧: (ぐそう) - silly monk/foolish monk; (used by monks) I/me
愚兄: (ぐけい) - foolish older brother; older brother
愚兄賢弟: (ぐけいけんてい) - (yoji) a foolish older brother and a smart younger
愚問愚答: (ぐもんぐとう) - (yoji) silly questions and silly answers; a silly dialogue
愚図つく: (ぐずつく) - to dawdle/to waste time doing nothing in particular; to fret/to sulk/to complain; to rain on and off
愚図る: (ぐずる) - to grumble; to be unsettled; to pick a quarrel
愚図付く: (ぐずつく) - to dawdle/to waste time doing nothing in particular; to fret/to sulk/to complain; to rain on and off
愚弟: (ぐてい) - younger brother; stupid younger brother
愚民政策: (ぐみんせいさく) - policy of keeping the people ignorant and easily subjugated
愚生: (ぐせい) - (primarily used in letters, etc.) I; me
愚痴の闇: (ぐちのやみ) - the darkness of ignorance
愚痴をこぼす: (ぐちをこぼす) - to whinge; to kvetch; to gripe; to complain; to whine
愚痴を溢す: (ぐちをこぼす) - to whinge; to kvetch; to gripe; to complain; to whine
愚痴を零す: (ぐちをこぼす) - to whinge; to kvetch; to gripe; to complain; to whine
愚痴聞き地蔵: (ぐちききじぞう) - Ksitigarbha (jizo) who listens to people's complaints (statue at the Keihou Temple at Nagoya)
愚痴話: (ぐちばなし) - tedious complaints; continual moaning
愚策: (ぐさく) - stupid plan/inane way of doing something; plan/project
愚考: (ぐこう) - foolish idea; one's humble opinion
愚者も千慮に一得: (ぐしゃもせんりょにいっとく) - Even fools can give good counsel.
愚者一得: (ぐしゃいっとく) - (yoji) Even a fool may sometimes give good counsel
愚連隊: (ぐれんたい) - gang of young toughs; hooligans; hoodlums; hoods; yobbos
愚鈍: (ぐどん) - stupidity; silliness; asininity; imbecility; dim-wittedness
愛: (ai) - amor, amor, afeto, cuidado; apego, desejo, vontade
愛々しい: (あいあいしい) - lovely; charming; sociable
愛おしい: (いとおしい) - lovely; sweet; precious; adorable
愛おしむ: (いとおしむ) - to love; to be attached to; to cherish; to caress
愛がん: (あいがん) - caring for (esp. a pet or a small object); cherishing; being fond of; prizing; treasuring
愛きょう: (あいきょう) - charm/attractiveness/amiability/winsomeness; courtesy/ingratiating behaviour; (usu. as 御愛嬌)  entertainment/amusement/fun
愛きょうをふりまく: (あいきょうをふりまく) - (common error is 愛想を振りまく) to make oneself pleasant to everybody; to smile at everybody; to try to please everybody; to make things pleasant
愛きょうを振りまく: (あいきょうをふりまく) - (common error is 愛想を振りまく) to make oneself pleasant to everybody; to smile at everybody; to try to please everybody; to make things pleasant
愛くるしい: (あいくるしい) - lovely; cute; charming; sweet
愛くろしい: (あいくろしい) - very sweet; very charming
愛しあう: (あいしあう) - to love one another/to be affectionate towards each other; to have sex/to make love
愛しい: (いとしい) - lovely; dear; beloved; darling
愛しがる: (いとしがる) - to treat with love; to pity; to cherish
愛しみ: (かなしみ) - sadness/sorrow/grief; (愛しみ only)  affection/love
愛しむ: (おしむ) - to be frugal/to be sparing; to value/to hold dear; to regret (e.g. a loss)/to feel sorry (for); to be unwilling/to be reluctant
愛し合う: (あいしあう) - to love one another/to be affectionate towards each other; to have sex/to make love
愛し子: (いとしご) - beloved child; dear child
愛し愛される: (あいしあいされる) - to love and be loved back; to love and be loved in return; to give and receive love
